publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2808 Robert Brown: Ratification of the Optional Protocol to the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child on the Involvement of Children in Armed Conflict-That the Parliament notes that Her Majesty's Government has not yet ratified the Optional Protocol to the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child on the Involvement of Children in Armed Conflict; notes the interest of this Parliament in protecting the rights of children; believes that children under 18 are entitled to the protection of the safeguards in the Protocol, and urges Her Majesty's Government to ratify the Protocol as soon as possible.

S1M-2808 Robert Brown: Ratification of the Optional Protocol to the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child on the Involvement of Children in Armed Conflict-That the Parliament notes that Her Majesty's Government has not yet ratified the Optional Protocol to the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child on the Involvement of Children in Armed Conflict; notes the interest of this Parliament in protecting the rights of children; believes that children under 18 are entitled to the protection of the safeguards in the Protocol, and urges Her Majesty's Government to ratify the Protocol as soon as possible.
